content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 0, Liverpool 4.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 0, Liverpool 4.
Substitution, Liverpool. Marko Grujic replaces Adam Lallana.
Substitution, Liverpool. Ben Woodburn replaces Philippe Coutinho.
Offside, Liverpool. Philippe Coutinho tries a through ball, but James Milner is caught offside.
Substitution, Liverpool. Lucas Leiva replaces Daniel Sturridge.
Divock Origi (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Winston Reid (West Ham United).
Attempt missed. Robert Snodgrass (West Ham United) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Sofiane Feghouli with a cross.
Attempt missed. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt saved. Divock Origi (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Divock Origi (Liverpool) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Adam Lallana.
Substitution, West Ham United. Robert Snodgrass replaces André Ayew.
Goal!  West Ham United 0, Liverpool 4. Divock Origi (Liverpool) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Georginio Wijnaldum.
Attempt missed. Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.
